p.1: The software you create will be used to manage our cloud service and supportive tooling. While working in a fast-paced environment with smart team members, you'll be responsible for understanding business requirements and constraints, converting requirements into viable software, and exposing APIs for application developers.

li: Convert business requirements and constraints into technically viable software.
li.1: Develop new libraries, tools, applications, and process for rapid development of features across a suite of integrated applications.
li.2: Diagram and document the software architecture.
li.3: Work within a team of other engineers, business analysts, and researchers.
li.4: Monitor and respond to system events to support customer success.
li.5: Candidate must be able to work independently and bring tasks to completion

p.6: A successful candidate will have the follow qualities:

li: Experience writing production applications in Go, Python, or C#
li.1: Experience in SQL database concepts, designs, and optimizations
li.2: Experience building HTTP APIs using REST, gRPC, or GraphQL

li: Knowledge of cloud computing environments (Azure, AWS)
li.1: Experience handling imagery and large data stores
li.2: Knowledge of data warehousing concepts and methodologies
li.3: Experience with robotics or machine learning
li.4: Experience with tools (git, static analyzers, linters) to manage code and improve code quality
li.5: Exposure to a breadth of software architectures and deployments (cloud, on-premise, mobile, desktop, edge)
li.6: BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Data Science, Data Engineering, or closely related computing field

p.11: The next step would be to complete the project based evaluation process on the Hatchways Platform.
p.14: As part of the Airtonomy team, your time will be spent working both independently and as a group to complete critical projects and develop solutions to advance the goals of the company and its customers. Work hours are flexible and regulated by the projects and work product required by your team and team supervisor. Benefits include unlimited leave per the terms outlined in our policy (sick and vacation) in addition to health, dental, and vision insurance.
p.17: Airtonomy is a fast-growing team of software engineers, robot specialists, aviation experts, and machine learning professionals building the software that industries are adopting for managing their drone fleet. Airtonomy is more than just drone management, we use advanced computer vision techniques, neural networks, and emerging technologies to autonomously capture, package, transport, integrate, and act on data.
